column5: Anybody fish the area of the North Channel Sault Ste Marie ON east toward Georgian Bay? Thinking of making a stop for a day or two, when heading north. Possibly in the Serpent River outlet area.

I have stayed at Brennan Harbour http://www.brennanharbour.com/about-...rennan-harbour It is right off the spanish river. Fishing was not great but we did catch walleye, northern, and smallmouth. Let me know what questions you have and I will attempt to answer them.

I'm traveling from S.E. PA up to the Chapleau area. Last year traveling through Ohio and Michigan it was 2 days and 22 hours. Too much for me at 68 y/o. This year I'm going by way of Niagara Falls and taking 3 days. Anyhow I picked a campground on the Serpent River about 12 miles west of the camp you mentioned for an overnite stay. Just seemed like a nice area, and thought if the fishing was good, I could spend a day or 2 coming and going. We have a slide in truck camper and pull our own boat, so being retired, we can spend some time along the way.
